db:abstract.db:para: MenuSeparator provides a separator for items inside a menu.

db:listitem.db:para: MenuSeparator is part of MenusButtons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
[read-only] type : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property is read-only and constant, and its value is MenuItemType.Separator.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether the menu separator should be visible.
